      • add

        public boolean add(Account account)
        Adds the specified account to the Bank if possible. If the account number already exists or the Bank has reached its maximum number of accounts, return false and do not add it; otherwise, add it and return true.
        Parameters:
        account -
        Returns:
        true if successful
